item.title: Nine years later
item.description:
In 2016 I had basal cell carcinoma cut out of the middle of my face. The dermatologist used the Mohs procedure, which helped minimize scarring.
Nine years later, and here we are! Also, no, this isn’t a selfie.
He did a good job and I’ve been able to stay cancer-free since. Get your skin checked regularly, folks, especially if you’re pale af like me!
Puppy tax. Sinna and Castle ❤️

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @copaceticus just finished this painting today!
27 Man Tax: Glenn Powell
“You can't expect to wield supreme executive power just 'cause some watery tart threw a sword at you!” - Monty Python & the Holy Grail I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! You can now find it here https://discord.gg/6nrrXJQa - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Still no SNAP so far. Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: I feel lost
item.description:
Depression and anxiety are a mother fucker. My best friend is continuing to further isolate himself. He has struggled with depression for years. Starting after his wife left him after only a year married, and admitted to jumping on every swinging dick she could find. Only to then OD in a park a few weeks later. It absolutely wrecked him. He has continued to try and push through, seeking all sorts of professional help. But getting a hold of him is harder and harder each month. Today he tells me his anxiety is keeping him from wanting to leave his house. Even though when he does he gets great joy from seeing and interacting with people.
Here he is surprising my son, 7 years ago, on Christmas Eve. I'll never forget the look on my kids face when Santa came walking through the door. This picture is my friend in a nutshell. He is such a wonderful human that brings light and joy everywhere he goes. I just don't know what to do? I know I will continue to reach out to him. But it's not like I can drag him out of the house, he is 6'4" and 300lbs (an absolute larger than life Santa). TLDR: my friend is struggling with mental health issues, and I don't know what I can do. It makes me sad.

item.title: This is actually memes don't let them trick you
item.description:
These are the voyages of the star ship froge. It's continuing mission: to explore strange new ponds. To seek out new bugs and new lily pads. To boldly croak where no one has croaked before!
Gottem!
We should go back to this.
That's me.
It's because the audience isn't being subjected to the same propaganda of the people living in the fictional universe. I assume this is the premise of Starship Troopers, though I've never seen it.
Complete lunatics.
It's true.
I've been on COBRA for nine months. I'll leave it to you to decide which.
Users never use the product correctly.
So are they really re-telling the movies? And I thought Disney was being lazy with Star Wars.
I guess I'm still not out of these.
Can confirm.
Bamboozled again!
Flesh and Blood TCG tax. Saw this for the first time when I had to remake my account after their server issues.

item.title: GovBrief Today #285
item.description: Trump again refused to rule out attacking Venezuela today. The difference is that the USS Gerald R. Ford strike group is now arriving. This armada includes destroyers, dozens of aircraft, and thousands of soldiers. They're linking up with a sizeable attack force already there. U.S. based aircraft are also within attack range. No one knows if this is saber-rattling, but 75 people are already dead from 19 vessel attacks without any evidence of their wrongdoing offered. Colombia's leadership today halted intelligence sharing between the two countries and has called for Donald Trump to be investigated for war crimes. The UN has also condemned America's attacks in the region. Call your representatives now. Tell them no war without congressional authorization. The War Powers Act exists for exactly this reason. Notice you're seeing less news on social media? We track the data—you're right. Social media networks are suppressing news stories more every day. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every brief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. Data, images, searchable archive. Free and private at govbrief.today. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/berkeley-kirk-protest-feds [2] https://go.govbrief.today/colombia-us-intelligence-sharing [3] https://go.govbrief.today/fda-regulatory-leader-padzur [4] https://go.govbrief.today/supreme-court-food-aid [5] https://go.govbrief.today/county-pays-newspaper-raid [6] https://go.govbrief.today/cfpb-civil-rights [7] https://go.govbrief.today/cfpb-funding-attacked [8] https://go.govbrief.today/ford-arrives-latin-america [9] https://go.govbrief.today/prison-call-rates [10] https://go.govbrief.today/grijalva-swearing-in-wed [11] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-threatens-bbc-lawsuit [12] https://go.govbrief.today/gop-rep-spouse-pardoned [13] https://go.govbrief.today/judge-utah-map-democrats Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com

item.title: I know I did the right thing but I can’t stop feeling bad about it
item.description: #memes #confession_bear I took my dad, step mother, wife, and kids out to dinner for my dad’s birthday this past weekend and I ended up telling him to fuck off. My parents divorced when I was young. My dad raised me and he’s a good man in almost every way except that he’s always had some sort of “them” that he feels a need to demonize. He’s properly brainwashed by Fox propaganda like so many in his demographic in the US. His latest version of this has been this “men in women’s sports” dog whistle anti trans bullshit. My daughter plays sports and he frames it as a warning to me as something I need to worry about to protect her. Last time he said something about it I let it go because I thought my kids were out of earshot. I felt bad enough as it was for being a coward and I felt worse when I learned my daughter overheard. I felt awful about setting a terrible example for her for not standing up to what I knew was wrong. This time he said something about it with everyone sitting around a table and I had had enough. I told him exactly what I thought of his bigoted bullshit and when he said I was disrespectful I told him he could fuck off. He’s old. We probably don’t have too many years left together. I wonder what the right thing to do is, mostly for my kids. Are they better off with a grandfather with this flaw or without one entirely? If we can repair our relationship I at least need to be clear about what I expect from him in how he talks around me and my family and I’m not sure how he’d take that. I’m not sorry I said what I said but I’m sorry that we had to land in this place.
item.dc:creator: JustMe4455
